## Source: ossf-package-analysis (761c8c702d1c6f29835b1775a32a8c74803561eedcfa366e674edfa369696484)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'marionette-react-view' @ 9.999.2 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
